page.title: 07South Lodge
page.content: Until l982 the{South Lodge}estate was owned by the{Godman}family. The last member of that family, Edith Godman, died in l982 and the estate passed to a nephew, Mr.{Tregear.} South Lodge house is very large and is no longer suitable for occupation as a private home. The house and some parkland surrounding it were sold off and the property is now being turned into a country hotel. At the time of writing the hotel has not opened but the opening is expected very soon. One function of the hotel will be to accommodate conference delegates for Eurotherm International, which has its headquarters across the road at Leonardslee.
